name: Larry Daugherty
text: I have been with Edward Jones for a few years and know Sharon & Vester and use them for my financial advisor and would recommend both, always great responsive service.

name: Charles Dean
text: Matt and staff are always helpful. I high recommend them for your financial needs.

name: Brian Burke
text:
He was fantastic. My scheduled appointment time ended up not working so we rescheduled, he called me and said something had come up and got me in immediately which worked perfectly for me. I appreciated his ability to fit me in so quickly.

He is very professional, well spoken, and knowledgeable. I knew I was opening an account, my wife was with me, she wasn't planning on investing but thankfully ended up doing so after a short talk with him. Can't say enough good about him, already made a great return on my investment.
